titles.title: NEPA Data Transparency and Accountability Act
A bill to amend the National Environmental Policy Act of 1969 to require the submission of certain reports, and for other purposes.
NEPA Data Transparency and Accountability Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

bill.summary:
NEPA Data Transparency and Accountability Act
This bill requires federal agencies to annually report on their environmental review activities under the National Environmental Policy Act of 1969 (NEPA).
The agencies must also include the cost of their NEPA activities in the annual reports after the Council on Environmental Quality and the Office of Management and Budget have developed a methodology to assess the comprehensive costs of the NEPA process.
